Constructs a new PhpGenrator generator. The generated PHP code will be saved to $file in $dir.

! Opens the file for writing and sets correct file permissions. \return The current file resource or \c false if it failed to open the file. \note The file name and path is supplied to the constructor of this class. \note Multiple calls to this method will only open the file once.
! Closes the currently open file if any.
